intent_atoms.description: Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG‑H fixtures must be obtained before importing assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark and archive runtime and RSS metrics under Documentation/Performance/.
macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture must be available in the automation environment before running the benchmark.
Publish performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 in PERFORMANCE.md after manual profiling with Xcode Instruments on macOS developer machine.
Render times measured by Time Profiler must be less than 100 ms, allocations must be under 5 MB, and Core Animation must verify 60 FPS on device for the manual performance profiling task.
Publish performance baselines after completing manual performance benchmarks across iOS 17, macOS 14, and iPadOS 17.

Build time must be under 10s for a clean build, binary size under 500 KB, memory footprint under 5 MB per screen, 60 FPS during interactions, and BoxTreePattern with 1000+ nodes must perform within acceptable limits.
Compile cross‑platform test results and create a cross‑platform report after manual testing on iOS, macOS, and iPadOS devices and simulators.
Tests must cover specified device models, window sizes, orientations, dark mode, RTL languages, and multiple locales/regions before compiling the report.
Achieve final accessibility sign‑off after manual VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, reduce motion, contrast, and bold text testing on real devices.
Manual accessibility testing must confirm 98% score from automated tests and cover all listed edge cases before sign‑off.

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Assets
functional_units.description: Import licensed media assets and refresh regression baselines for tolerant parsing and export validation

functional_units.name: Archive Benchmark Metrics
functional_units.description: Execute macOS benchmark, collect runtime and RSS metrics, and archive them in Documentation/Performance/

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publish performance baseline data to PERFORMANCE.md after profiling with Xcode Instruments

functional_units.name: CI Integration with Performance Gates
functional_units.description: Integrate performance benchmarks into CI pipeline with gates for build time, binary size, memory footprint, FPS, and node count

functional_units.name: Compile Cross-Platform Test Report
functional_units.description: Compile results from cross-platform device and simulator testing into a comprehensive report

functional_units.name: Final Accessibility Sign-Off
functional_units.description: Complete manual accessibility testing and sign off on accessibility compliance
